titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: NEWBORN HEARING SCREENING OUTCOME RIGHT EAR (NATIONAL NEONATAL DATA SET) - Permitted Codes

stentry.p: Passed (where the NEWBORN HEARING SCREENING OUTCOME is 'Clear response, no follow up required' )

Failed (where the NEWBORN HEARING SCREENING OUTCOME is 'Clear Response, targeted follow up required' , 'No clear response, bilateral referral' , 'No clear response, unilateral referral', or 'Incomplete' )
